wikipedia_page.main:
Aled Summerhill  is a Rhondda born, Welsh rugby union player who plays for the Cardiff Blues as a centre, winger, or as a fullback. He was a Wales under-18 international.
Summerhill made his debut for the Cardiff Blues in 2014 having previously played for the Cardiff Blues academy.
Summerhill made his debut for the Blues regional team in 2014 having previously played for the Blues academy, Porth RFC, Pontypridd RFC and Treorchy RFC. He broke into the team during the 2015 Rugby World Cup period scoring 3 tries in his first 3 games of the season. His performances earned him a callup to train with the Wales national team, although this turned out to be a breach in protocol, for which Wales were warned.
